column2: With the growth of our power we no longer need the contact with the colonial ports of the European Great Powers. Perhaps we could ask them to relinguish their claims on that territory?

column2: With the growing power of Indian natives our local colonies have become almost worthless. If we cede our colonies to them it would simultaneously relieve us of the headache of running them and greatly improve our relationship with them.
It is our gate to India!
